name: wanderer
description: An experimental cross-platform organising app for wandering ideas.

scripts.fresh: rimraf ./src/saves && cd src && mkdir saves && cd .. && electron --trace-warnings .
scripts.start-bst: npm run bt && npm run c-sass && electron .
scripts.fresh-bs: npm run c-sass && npm run fresh
scripts.fresh-be: npm run be && npm run fresh
scripts.fresh-bet: npm run bt && npm run fresh-be
scripts.fresh-bes: npm run be && npm run fresh-bs
scripts.fresh-best: npm run bt && npm run fresh-bes
scripts.c-sass: sass ./src/main/styles.scss ./dist/main/styles.css && sass ./src/main/titlebar-style.scss ./dist/main/titlebar-style.css && sass ./src/dev/titlebars/prompts/link/titlebar-style.scss ./dist/dev/titlebars/prompts/link/titlebar-style.css && sass ./src/main/prompts/configs/configs.scss ./dist/main/prompts/configs/configs.css && npm run c-css

author: Nojus Kondrotas <nojus.kondrotas23@gmail.com>
